    • Uses of Field in com.dotmarketing.portlets.structure.model

      Methods in com.dotmarketing.portlets.structure.model that return Field 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Field Structure.getField(java.lang.String fieldName)
      Deprecated. 
      This is a not recommended way to obtain a field since the field label name can be changed by the user
      Field Structure.getFieldVar(java.lang.String velocityVarName)
      Retrieves a field by the velocity variable name, This should be the preferred method to obtain a field since the velocity variable name of the field never changes after it gets created.
